foodsMenu.name: The OG Burger
foodsMenu.description: The original BunDrop burger. Like the crabby patty you just cant go wrong with the OG one

foodsMenu.name: Midnight Burger
foodsMenu.description: I promise we've heard every joke you could possibly think of about this being a burnt burger

foodsMenu.name: Double Burger
foodsMenu.description: For those in the bulking phase, or just using the bulking phase as an excuse like they've done the past 2 years

foodsMenu.name: Double Sweet Burger
foodsMenu.description: Double the pattys and double the amount of sweet caramelized onion, with some paprica thrown in there too

foodsMenu.name: Double Muscle Burger
foodsMenu.description: You got no stomache space to waste on veggies? This burger is all meat, and a LOT of sauce. You're gonna need a napkin

foodsMenu.name: Mini Burger
foodsMenu.description: They say size doesn't matter and so hopefully this miniature burger will still satisfyingly fill you up

foodsMenu.name: Ham-burger
foodsMenu.description: It makes for a great pun but our chefs hate it when customers try to order this without confusing them

foodsMenu.name: Crispy Burger
foodsMenu.description: With crispy bread and crispy bacon, this burger will both sound and taste delightful. That is if its not soggy when finally delivered

foodsMenu.name: The Giga Burger
foodsMenu.description: You're not eating this for any other reason than to make a statement, to let them know nothing less than the biggest is enough for you

foodsMenu.name: OG Fries
foodsMenu.description: The OG fries. Can't have a burger without the fries. Skinny and extra crispy with just a little tender inside

foodsMenu.name: Sweet Fries
foodsMenu.description: Thick cuts of sweet potato with the crispy skin still on it. Coated with salt and herbs

foodsMenu.name: Calpis water
foodsMenu.description: The great thing about sugar is you can dissolve a large amount of it in water without changing the opacity

foodsMenu.name: Tropical energy tropical bliss
foodsMenu.description: Not even going to try and sugarcoat this one. You already know how bad energy drinks are for you
